observation: KT Magic, Inc. - Kenna Thompson Magic - Magic Auction - The Magic Collector - The Taytelbaum Collector  Early Marshall Brodien TV Magic Cups Antique European Card Wheel 1713 Simon Witgeest Natuurlyk Toverboek Irving The Magician Panel Poster 42" x 13 5/8" Rare Circa 20's Conradi Horster Table Model Card In Balloon 1999 Vernon Spinning Coin The Spirit Cut C.M. Bedford Radar Pencil Brass Vase and Coin with Extra - Netherlands 23 April 2024 **KT Magic Auction Alert** Click here to join our mailing list and receive Auction, Shop and Sales updates. www.ktmagicauction.com. This is a standard auction format with no proxy bidding which means the bid you enter is what will automatically show and be taken as what you are going to pay if you win the item. The system also allows for you to increase your bid amount if this is a bidding method you wish to use. This process is also helpful in reaching a reserve amount. Shipping/Insurance charges are in addition to winning bid amounts. What you will not have at the end of the auction is the addition of Buyer's Premiums that can range from 15% to 25% and more. Welcome to KT Magic!  We are a business for Quality Pre-Owned Conjuring Apparatus, Books and anything pertaining to Magic.  Auctions, Collecting, Buying and Selling anything pertaining to magic.  We offer monthly auctions so please check in often and you may register for our auction to receive notices or subscribe to our mailing list. KT Magic Auction Special List Visit our How To Order page for Special List ordering information. KT Magic, Inc. - Kenna Thompson Magic kt@ktmagic.com

This longevity and consistency in the domain's registration details are good indicators of legitimacy and do not fit the typical profile of a scam website.
